data.lyric:
[ti:7 Summers]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:7 Summers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]7 Summers - Morgan Wallen
[00:06.81]Lyrics by：Morgan Wallen/Shane McAnally/Josh Osborne
[00:13.62]Composed by：Morgan Wallen/Shane McAnally/Josh Osborne
[00:20.43]Yeah you used to talk about
[00:22.05]
[00:22.81]Getting even further South
[00:24.85]Somewhere where the summer lasted all year 'round
[00:28.66]Probably got a big ol' diamond on your hand right now
[00:31.54]Maybe a baby or a couple by now
[00:34.00]Long driveway to a big white house
[00:36.75]
[00:37.50]But I wonder when you're drinking if you
[00:41.30]Find yourself thinking about
[00:43.67]That boy from East Tennessee
[00:46.96]And I know we both knew better
[00:49.92]But we still said forever
[00:52.22]And that was seven summers
[00:54.57]Of Coke and Southern Comfort
[00:56.96]Were we dumb or just younger who knows
[01:01.12]Back then you used to love the river
[01:03.95]And sippin' on a sixer with me
[01:07.19]Does it ever make you sad to know
[01:09.29]That was seven summers ago
[01:11.59]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:18.63]
[01:21.62]Yeah I bet your daddy's so proud
[01:23.89]Of how his little girl turned out
[01:26.09]Think she dodged a bullet
[01:27.76]Of a good old boy like me
[01:29.82]'Cause I still
[01:30.74]Go drinkin' same friends on Friday
[01:32.71]Bought a few acres couple roads off the highway
[01:35.12]Guess you never saw things my way anyway
[01:37.53]
[01:38.59]But I wonder when you're drinking if you
[01:42.49]Find yourself thinking about
[01:44.81]That boy from East Tennessee
[01:48.07]And I know we both knew better
[01:51.00]But we still said forever
[01:53.34]And that was seven summers
[01:55.68]Of Coke and Southern Comfort
[01:57.92]Were we dumb or just younger who knows
[02:02.19]Back then you used to love the river
[02:05.14]And sippin' on a sixer with me
[02:08.41]Does it ever make you sad to know
[02:10.44]That was seven summers ago
[02:12.96]Ooh
[02:15.86]Seven summers ago
[02:17.62]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:20.49]Seven summers ago
[02:22.47]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:28.65]
[02:30.53]Yeah I wonder when you're drinking if you
[02:34.24]Find yourself thinking about
[02:36.64]That boy from East Tennessee
[02:39.89]And I know we both knew better
[02:42.80]But we still said forever
[02:45.05]And that was seven summers
[02:47.49]Of Coke and Southern Comfort
[02:49.84]Were we dumb or just younger who knows
[02:54.00]Back then you used to love the river
[02:56.86]And sippin' on a sixer with me
[03:00.03]Does it ever make you sad to know
[03:02.21]That was seven summers ago
[03:04.54]Ooh
[03:07.51]Seven summers ago
[03:09.74]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[03:12.19]Seven summers ago
[03:14.11]Ooh ooh ooh
data.trans:
[ti:7 Summers]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:7 Summers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.81]//
[00:13.62]//
[00:20.43]你以前常说
[00:22.05]
[00:22.81]你想继续向南走
[00:24.85]来到全年都是盛夏的乐土
[00:28.66]也许你现在手上已经戴着一枚钻戒
[00:31.54]也许我们现在会抚养着一两个孩子
[00:34.00]长长私家车道通往一栋白色房子
[00:36.75]
[00:37.50]可我想知道 你喝到醉醺醺时 你会不会
[00:41.30]发现你思念着
[00:43.67]那个来自田纳西州东边的男孩
[00:46.96]我知道我们都心知肚明
[00:49.92]我们依然承诺彼此厮守一生
[00:52.22]这是我们一起度过的七个夏天
[00:54.57]喝着可乐和鸡尾酒
[00:56.96]我们到底是愚昧无知还是少不更事 谁知道呢
[01:01.12]那时你对河边情有独钟
[01:03.95]与我一起啜饮美酒
[01:07.19]当你察觉这是七年前的夏日往事时
[01:09.29]你会不会感到一丝忧伤
[01:11.59]//
[01:18.63]
[01:21.62]我想你爸爸一定十分骄傲
[01:23.89]看到他的宝贝女儿如今的样子
[01:26.09]以为她躲过
[01:27.76]像我这样的男孩的纠缠
[01:29.82]因为我一如往昔
[01:30.74]和我的好友在周五喝上几杯
[01:32.71]买下几英亩土地 几条远离高速路的小道
[01:35.12]我想你想从未站在我的角度看待这一切
[01:37.53]
[01:38.59]可我想知道 你喝到醉醺醺时 你会不会
[01:42.49]发现你思念着
[01:44.81]那个来自田纳西州东边的男孩
[01:48.07]我知道我们都心知肚明
[01:51.00]我们依然承诺彼此厮守一生
[01:53.34]这是我们一起度过的七个夏天
[01:55.68]喝着可乐和鸡尾酒
[01:57.92]我们到底是愚昧无知还是少不更事 谁知道呢
[02:02.19]那时你对河边情有独钟
[02:05.14]与我一起啜饮美酒
[02:08.41]当你察觉这是七年前的夏日往事时
[02:10.44]你会不会感到一丝忧伤
[02:12.96]//
[02:15.86]七年前的夏日往事
[02:17.62]//
[02:20.49]七年前的夏日往事
[02:22.47]//
[02:28.65]

[02:34.24]发现你思念着
[02:36.64]那个来自田纳西州东边的男孩
